prodNameC: "德曼遜" 肌酸激每同功每MB 弗列克斯 試劑組
prodNameE: "Dimension" MBI Creatine Kinase MB Flex reagent cartridge
ingredientsDesc:
Wells	Form 	Ingredient 	Concentrationb 
1 – 3	Liquid 	NADP 	2.46 mmol/L 
Reagent 1 		ADP 	2.46 mmol/L 
		AMP 	6.14 mmol/L 
		Diadenosine Pentaphosphate (AP5A) 	19 μmol/L 
		N-acetyl cysteine 	24.6 mmol/L 
		Hexokinase 	≥ 36.7 μkat/L 
		G-6-PDH 	≥ 23.4 μkat/L 
		EDTA 	2.46 mmol/L 
		Mg acetate 	12.3 mmol/L 
		Imidazole buffer 	123 mmol/L 
6c 	Liquid 	Glucose 	120 mmol/L 
Reagent 2 		Creatine phosphate 	184 mmol/L 
		Anti CK-M antibody 	0.24 mg/mL 
		Mg Acetate 	11 mmol/L 
		3-(cyclohexylamino)-2-hydroxyl-1-propane sulfonic acid (CAPSO Buffer) 	20 mmol/L 
		EDTA 	2.46 mmol/L

applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 肌酸激每同功每MB測試法為體外診斷檢測方法，藉由Dimension臨床化學系統，可定量偵測人類血清/血漿中肌酸激每同功每MB活性。
